duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct day-to-day bookkeeping tasks and uphold accurate financial records.
Manage accounts payable and accounts receivable processes to ensure accurate and timely financial transactions.
Reconcile bank statements and maintain general ledger accounts for precise financial recordkeeping.
Prepare quarterly financial statements and revenue reports.
Assist in preparation of monthly project invoices.
Collaborate with project managers to track project costs and budgets, ensuring accurate project reporting and contracting.
Provide support during month-end and year-end closings.
Collaborate, on a regular and ongoing basis, with Accounting Manager to ensure meticulous financial data.
Contribute to the formulation of budgets and forecasts.
Analyze financial data processes to identify patterns, anomalies, and avenues for enhancement.
Stay abreast of evolving accounting regulations and best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field
